name: test_e2e_with_logs[028_SQLI_ERROR_010]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_ERROR_010` |
| **Name** | MULTIPOINT geometry error injection |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | error_based |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' AND MULTIPOINT((SELECT * FROM(SELECT name_const(version(),1),name_const(version(),1))x)) --`
- **Encoded**: `%27%20AND%20MULTIPOINT%28%28SELECT%20%2A%20FROM%28SELECT%20name_const%28version%28%29%2C1%29%2Cname_const%28version%28%29%2C1%29%29x%29%29%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~25000ms
- **Timestamp**: 04:53:38.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_ERROR_010-1767070418932-hiehe9 pattern_id=SQLI_ERROR_010 uri=/?q=%27%20AND%20MULTIPOINT%28%28SELECT%20%2A%20FROM%28SELECT%20name_const%28version%28%29%2C1%29%2Cname_const%28version%28%29%2C1%29%29x%29%29%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
04:53:38.000000000: Critical [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_ERROR_010-1767070418932-hiehe9 pattern_id=SQLI_ERROR_010 uri=/?q=%27%20AND%20MULTIPOINT%28%28SELECT%20%2A%20FROM%28SELECT%20name_const%28version%28%29%2C1%29%2Cname_const%28version%28%29%2C1%29%29x%29%29%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
```
